text: List of Lists: finding a value throughout
I am using Python to write a program that looks through lists of lists and changes values.
In my list of lists I have 3's and I want to find their index.
Right now I can only get it to work on the first row.
I want it to find 3's on any of the lists in "numbers.
Here is some sample code to wash away the mud:
When I run it I get:

code:
Found 3 at index 0
Found 3 at index 1
Found 3 at index 2
Found 3 at index 4
Found 3 at index 5
Found 3 at index 6
Found 3 at index 8

text: Which shows that it is working but only on the first row.
